title: New Features, UI Improvements & Bug Fixes
newFeatures: Added extension loading popup to show progress during loading
Implemented a ban system with an appeal system
Added new settings tab with: Auto-Remove Inactive Friends BETA, Enable Live UI Updates, Filter by Account Age, Allow Game Join via Status
You can now join a user's game by pressing their in-game status (setting must be enabled)
Improved auth system – extension works after reopening browser without needing to open Roblox for 24 hours
Added report system next to every error message in popup
uiImprovements: Updated welcome page with better animations and design
Updated update log with new expand style on welcome page
Removed welcome page on first install; goes directly to settings
Updated popup dark mode – cleaner design
Updated both Terms and Privacy pages
Friends details user list now scales correctly
bugFixes: Fixed issue allowing data export with no data
otherChanges: Removed three popup settings: Auto-update avatars in history, Save avatars locally, Auto refresh friends list
Removed unnecessary dependencies and optimized code
